about.title: About Precision Auto Care
about.body: Family-owned and operated since 2010, Precision Auto Care is your trusted partner for auto repair and maintenance. Our ASE-certified master technicians use state-of-the-art diagnostic equipment and quality parts to keep your vehicle running at its best. We believe in honest communication, fair pricing, and service that exceeds expectations.
about.subtitle: Why choose us

items.name: Spring Oil Change Special
items.description: Full synthetic oil change with free multi-point inspection and tire rotation

items.name: Brake Service Package
items.description: Brake pads, rotors if needed, brake fluid flush. Front or rear axle.

items.text: Best auto shop I've ever used! They diagnosed the issue accurately, explained everything clearly, and the repair was done right the first time. Fair pricing and excellent service.
items.author: Jennifer Park

items.text: I've been bringing my cars here for 5 years. The technicians are knowledgeable, honest, and they stand behind their work. The warranty gives me peace of mind. Highly recommend!
items.author: Michael Chen

items.text: Had a complex transmission issue and they diagnosed and fixed it perfectly. Great communication throughout the process and reasonable pricing. These guys know what they're doing!
items.author: David Martinez

members.name: Tom Anderson
members.title: Owner & Master Technician
members.bio: Tom is an ASE Master Certified technician with 25+ years of experience. He founded Precision Auto Care to provide honest, expert service to the community.

members.name: Carlos Rodriguez
members.title: Lead Diagnostic Technician
members.bio: Carlos specializes in complex diagnostics and electrical systems. His expertise with modern computerized vehicles is second to none.

members.name: Mike Johnson
members.title: Master Technician
members.bio: Mike handles everything from routine maintenance to engine rebuilds. His attention to detail ensures every job is done right.

warranty.title: Industry-Leading Warranty
warranty.subtitle: We stand behind our work
warranty.description: All repairs come with our 2-year/24,000-mile warranty‚Äîone of the best in the industry. If you have any issues with our work, we'll make it right.

contact.title: Visit Our Shop
contact.subtitle: Schedule your service today
contact.parking: Customer parking available ‚Ä¢ Waiting area with WiFi

items.question: Do I need an appointment?
items.answer: Appointments are recommended for faster service, but we accept walk-ins based on availability. For oil changes and quick services, we often have same-day availability.

items.question: What's your warranty coverage?
items.answer: We offer a 2-year/24,000-mile warranty on all repairs‚Äîone of the best in the industry. This covers both parts and labor, and it's honored nationwide.

items.question: Do you work on all makes and models?
items.answer: Yes! Our ASE-certified technicians are trained to work on all domestic and foreign vehicles, from economy cars to luxury vehicles and trucks.

items.question: How long do repairs take?
items.answer: It depends on the service. Oil changes take 30-45 minutes, while major repairs may require several hours or days. We'll provide a time estimate when you drop off your vehicle.

items.question: Do you provide loaner cars?
items.answer: We offer a courtesy shuttle service within a 10-mile radius. For longer repairs, we can help arrange rental cars at discounted rates.

items.question: Can I wait while my car is serviced?
items.answer: Absolutely! We have a comfortable waiting area with WiFi, coffee, and TV. For quick services like oil changes, most customers choose to wait.

items.question: Do you offer financing?
items.answer: Yes, we offer financing options for larger repairs through our partners. Ask our service advisors for details and approval is usually quick.

items.question: What if I need emergency service?
items.answer: Call us immediately! We'll do our best to accommodate emergencies. For after-hours emergencies, leave a message and we'll respond first thing in the morning.
